txt.en: Bring the Dourhand coffers to Órug
Hlídborg can be found in south east Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should travel to Hlídborg.
'Dourhands! Are you sure?! Why would the stone-giants be in league with the Dourhands?\n\n'Kúzun, what do you make of this revelation?'
Kúzun can be found at Leitstáth.\n\nYou should talk to Kúzun.

'This certainly would explain their inactivity, if they ally with the Dourhands instead of the Angmarim. The Dourhands must have arranged a pact with the Grímklettar under cover of night, and after, the Angmarim left the stone-giants be.\n\n'I thought the Dourhands and the Angmarim were allies?! Their relationship may be in more turmoil than we thought!'
Find evidence of Angmarim influence over the stone-giants
This coffer of tribute seems to be from the Dourhands!
The stone-giant encampment of Hlídborg remains the last giant-hold upon the slopes of Câr Bronach.
Órug can be found at Leitstáth.\n\nYou should bring the Dourhand coffers to Órug.

'The rumours of a barricade on the eastern edge of Câr Bronach have proven to be false. What we found when we arrived was a group of stone-giants, encamped on the nearby slopes. We have watched them, waiting for them to strike or prepare for war. Instead, they sit idle.  They were recently visited by the Angmarim. We were not able to eavesdrop, and as such, we do not know what conversation transpired.\n\n'If you were able to infiltrate Hlídborg, I am sure we would find some evidence of Angmarim influence over the stone-giants.'
Dourhand coffers can be found at Hlídborg.\n\nYou should collect any Dourhand coffers that you find.
Hlídborg can be found in south east Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should find some evidence of Angmarim influence over the stone-giants.
